reports.title: Reports
reports.description: View reports and statistics about citizens, cards, and institutions in the system.

insights.citizenAge: The 19-30 age group represents the largest segment of registered citizens.
insights.citizenGender: The distribution between males and females is nearly balanced in the system.
insights.registrationTrend: There is a steady increase in new citizen registrations over the past six months.
insights.cardStatus: The majority of cards (81%) are in active status, with 11% expired needing renewal.
insights.cardIssuance: May saw the highest rate of card issuance in the first half of the year.
insights.cardUsage: Pharmacies are the most frequent users of cards, followed by hospitals.
insights.institutionType: Pharmacies represent the largest percentage of institutions registered in the system (41%).
insights.institutionStatus: 75% of institutions are active, with 13% pending approval.
insights.licenseExpiry: There is an increase in the number of expired licenses in May, with a corresponding increase in renewals.
